content.question: All of the following statements about invasive exotic species are true EXCEPT:

choices.label: They may compete with native species for food.
They may prey on native species.
They are generally introduced by human activity.
They may be plant or animal species.
They tend to have low reproductive rates.

content.answer: They tend to have low reproductive rates.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
